summary: A Boss Puppet Master, His Followers, and new weops! Lair in progress.
descriptionHtml:
****THIS FILE HAS BEEN UPDATED******
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10419



Ok 
This mod adds a new boss and some familiars of his. The Puppet master follows the daedric gods,
He is a source of evil and he is creating an army of puppets to destroy mankind and those alike! He is located outside of riverwood by the little hut across the river. Be warned he is not a simple kill but after you take control back over the land you will be rewarded greatly!   
This  is only a temp position for him I am in progress of creating his lair I have also added a few buildings and deco to that location. If you like it vote and endorse there is more mods to come soon.
+ more goody\'s Please remember to ENDORSE & Vote if you like this mod. That tends to make me  work harder.
author: Rodrick1981
